title: ICT exports achieve  $1.057 bln mark in 1st quarter of FY2025–26
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 20 (APP):Pakistan’s Information and Communication Technology (ICT) exports surpassed the impressive $1.057 billion mark during the first quarter (July–September) of the fiscal year 2025–26, marking a 20.5 percent increase compared to

According to the Ministry of Information Technology and Telecommunication, ICT exports for September 2025 alone surged to $366 million, reflecting a strong year-on-year growth of 25.3 percent from $292 million recorded in September 2024.

Among all service sectors, the ICT industry remained the top performer, contributing the highest trade surplus and accounting for 48 percent of Pakistan’s total services exports.
